server-url.Name: Server Url
server-url.Hint: The URL on which Ethereal Plane Server is running

enabled.Name: Enable Module
enabled.Hint: If this is not checked, the module will not connect to the server

sendRollsToChat.Name: Send Rolls to Chat
sendRollsToChat.Hint: If this is checked, public rolls will be forwarded to stream chat

enableChatTab.Name: Chat Tab
enableChatTab.Hint: If this is checked, the Chat Tab will be loaded
